title: Tree Trouble with only an Axe
text: How do I cut down the huge tree with only my hand axe?

answers.text: I suggest you call in the army and have them nuke the tree from space.

payment.message: Thanks! This was a very helpful answer.

answers.text: GO to your local Walmart - they have great saws there.
Potentially you could just buy a chainsaw and be done with it. Until then hit it really hard if you can. Lots of times too, that's going to be essential.
